activities: Mozido StickyStreet receives and warehouses data regarding individuals who are Customers of businesses who are Clients of Agencies who use our cloud-based, software-as-a-service tools to track and report on loyalty programs offered by the Agencies to their Clients regarding their Customers.  StickyStreet thus provides the warehousing and reporting of that data through web-based tools. StickyStreet itself does not sell or lease that data to anyone. Customer data remains in our servers and not transferred anywhere else without permission.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Mozido StickyStreet warehouses and provides reports on client, customer, and transactional data for agencies and their clients around the world. No data is manually processed.
recoursemech:
Customers, Clients, and Agencies each have access to websites that allow them to manage their data. Complaints, if any, go from Customer to Client (Business), from Client(Business) to Agency (local licensee of the Mozido StickyStreet platform and tools), and from Agency to Mozido StickyStreet.

We will use BBB's EU Safe Harbor Program for dispute resolution.
